info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 10:18PM EST until February 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Some blowing and drifting snow tonight. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte County. In Michigan, Berrien County. * WHEN...From 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ this evening to 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. Most of the snow accumulation is expected tonight through midday Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will fall below freezing tonight and cause a rapid freeze. Wind chills will drop to 0 to 5 degree above. A period of gusty northwest winds to 45 mph early tonight will cause blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you are traveling tonight, be prepared for wintry driving conditions. Have blankets, a flashlight, extra food, a cell phone and water in case you get stranded.
